item.title: Inbreeding
item.description: स्वाभिप्रायः PV kANe and others proposed this reform: “sApiNDya rules exactly suffice on both sides.” धर्मशास्त्रेष्व् अभिप्रायः असपिण्डा च या मातुर् असगोत्रा च या पितुः । सा प्रशस्ता द्विजातीनां दारकर्मणि मैथुने ॥ इति मनुः। विस्तारो ऽत्र। Gautama (4. 2-5).—‘Marriage should he performed with persons not belonging to the same Pravara;—above the Seventh grade among his paternal relations;—also beyond persons of the same seed;—and above the fifth grade among maternal relations.
